short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: add a tab of badges with the ability to sort them and view additional information

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension gives you more detailed information about badges in Roblox, improves their appearance and allows you to sort them.

Compatible with BTRoblox and RoPro.
